author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

TSG supports one mode of using `hltGetConfiguration` with option `--output full`  (according to [SWGuideGlobalHLT twiki page](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/SWGuideGlobalHLT#hlt_GetConfiguration): all output modules are removed, a single one is added which saves everything). 
This mode is not tested currently anywhere in central piples, which leads to occasionally having it broken, see e.g. https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47697 or https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37207.
The goal of this PR is to setup a few unit tests to test this use case such that one can act beforehand at the moment of the menu building.  

#### PR validation:

Run successfully:

```
scram b runtests_test_GRunFullOutput use-ibeos
scram b runtests_test_HIonFullOutput use-ibeos
scram b runtests_test_SpecialFullOutput use-ibeos
```

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: add a unit tests for running `GRun`, `HIon`, `Special` in FULL output mode
